event.title: Veterans day Event will be help on 11 Nov 2018
event.description:
One of the most popular United States Public Holidays is the Veterans Day. Celebrated on the 11th of November every year, Veterans Day marks the honoring of Military veterans who have served their nation through the United States Armed Forces. The people who fought for the nation and brought glorifying days of freedom should be honored and this particular day is meant for it. Before getting into the details of how to celebrate Veterans Day, Why Do We Celebrate Veterans Day 2018.
